info.title: AMCS Pay External API
info.description: # Getting Started ## Document Purpose and Scope The AMCS Pay REST API endpoints are technically described in this document. This document's goal is to instruct readers on how to interface with the AMCS Pay REST API. ## About AMCS Pay AMCS Pay offers waste & recycling operators feature-rich payment services that broaden their ability to compete in a rapidly evolving marketplace. The services include card payments, ACH payments, Google Pay, Apple Pay, and many alternative payment methods. AMCS Pay supports multiple recognized industry partners such as Global Payments, ACI Worldwide etc. ## Communicating to AMCS Pay API A calling application must first sign up as a Tenant. A private key is created after successful registration and will be used as the Personal Access Token (PAT). The Tenant Private Key is then supplied during authentication and authorization through the ("/authTokens") endpoint. This creates a cookie, which needs to be tracked in a cookie container. Subsequent calls to the REST API will then use this cookie to authenticate and authorize requests.

post.description:
This endpoint is used for authentication and authorisation of a calling application by supplying the Tenant Private Key in the privateKey property. When successful, Platform.PAY.SessionToken is added to the cookie. 

## Request

| **Property** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| PrivateKey | This is a Personal Access Token (PAT), generated during Tenant Registration. |

## Response
Additional fields from the response, other from the one below, can be disregarded.

| **Property** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| AuthResult | The authentication and authorization result. Returns "ok" if successful otherwise returns "invalidCredentials".

schema.description: Subsequent calls to the REST API will use this cookie to authenticate and authorize requests.

post.description:
This endpoint is used to initiate a payment/tokenization request via the Provider's hosted payments page (HPP).

## Request

| Property                  | Description  |
| ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| RequestType                      |Request Type can be any of "OneOffPayment", "Tokenization".                            |
| PaymentType               | Payment Type can be any of "CARD", "ACH ".                      |
| TransactionOrigin                 | Transaction Origin can be any of "MOTO", "ECOM"        |
| CallerIdentifier               | The Caller Identification associated to the Payment request.             |
| RequestId               | The Caller supplied GUID associated to the Payment request.        |
| ProviderType                   |Provide Type can be any of "ACICards", "ACIElectronic", "Heartland", "MerchantPartners",  "Payment Express", "Realex"        |
| TransactionAmount                     |The amount associated to the payment request.        |
| TransactionAmount.PrincipalAmount                     |The base amount associated to the payment request (This field is optional for Tokenization).        |
| TransactionAmount.ServiceFeeAmount                     |The service fee amount associated to the payment request.        |
| TransactionAmount.Currency                     |The currency associated to the payment request.        |
| CanStoreProfile                         | The flag suggests store the profile to vault.        |
| CompletionURL                         | The Completion URL Request associated to the customer mandate for webhooks.        |
| Addresses                         | The List of addresses associated to the customer mandate for 3ds transaction (Billing address is mandatory for 3ds enabled transaction).        |
| Addresses[0].AddressType                         | The AddressType associated to the address can be any of "Billing", "Shipping".        |
| Addresses[0].StreetAddress1                         | The StreetAddress Line1 associated to the address.        |
| Addresses[0].StreetAddress2                         | The StreetAddress Line2 associated to the address.        |
| Addresses[0].StreetAddress3                         | The StreetAddress Line3 associated to the address (Conditionally required).        |
| Addresses[0].City                         | The City associated to the address.        |
| Addresses[0].State                         | The State associated to the address.        |
| Addresses[0].PostCode                         | The PostCode associated to the address.        |
| Addresses[0].Country                         | The Country associated to the address.        |
| Addresses[0].ISO3166Numeric                         | The ISO3166Numeric associated to the address (Conditionally required).        |
| Contacts                         | The Contacts associated to the customer mandate for 3ds transaction (Contact type 'Mobile' and 'Email' are mandatory for 3ds enabled transaction).        |
| Contacts[0].ContactType                         | The Contact Type associated to the contact can be any of type "Email", "Mobile".        |
| Contacts[0].ContactValue                         | The Contact Value associated to the contact type.        |
| CustomerInfo                         | The Details associated to the customer mandate for risk assessment (Conditionally required for making payments using ACI Cards).        |
| CustomerInfo.CustomerName                         | The Customer Name associated to the customer.        |
| CustomerInfo.CustomerId                         | The Customer Id associated to the customer.        |
| CustomerInfo.CustomerIP                         | The Customer Ip associated to the customer.        |
| CustomerInfo.CustomerStatus                         | The Customer Status associated to the customer.        |
| CustomerInfo.WebsiteUrl                         | The Website Url associated to the customer.

## Response

| Property                  | Description  |
| ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| HppUrl                      | The Hosted Payment Page Url to load in a frame/browser.        |
| CallerTransactionId               |  The AMCS generated Request GUID associated to the Payment request.                              |
| TransactionAmount                     |The amount associated to the payment request.        |
| TransactionAmount.PrincipalAmount                     |The base amount associated to the payment request (This field is optional for Tokenization).        |
| TransactionAmount.ServiceFeeAmount                     |The service fee amount associated to the payment request.        |
| TransactionAmount.Currency                     |The currency associated to the payment request.                              |
| TransactionStatus                 | The Transaction Status associated to the Payment request.

get.description:
This endpoint is used to poll the AmcsPay database to make sure whether the provider's hosted payments page(HPP) has sent the transaction response back to AmcsPay.

## Request

| **Property** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| CallerTransactionId | The AMCS generated Request GUID associated to the hosted payments page. |

## Response

| **Property** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| AMCSPayReferenceId | The AMCS generated Response GUID associated to the Payment request. |
| ProviderReference | The reference number associated to the payment provider. |
| ProviderResponseCode | The response code associated to the payment provider. |
| Notes | More information associated to the payment. |
| ProviderAuthCode | The authorization code associated to the payment provider.  |
| ResponseTimeStamp | The Timestamp of the payment response payload. |
| TransactionStatus | The Transaction Status associated to the payment can be any of type "Initiated", "Success", "Failure", "Timeout", "Cancelled". |
| TokenReference | The Token Reference sent by the provider associated to the original payment (Tokenisation Response). |
| HistoryReference | The history reference data sent by the provider associated to the original payment (Tokenisation Response). |
| MaskedProfileNumber | The Profile/Card Number sent by the provider associated to the original payment (Tokenisation Response) (Conditionally required). |
| ProfileType | The Profile/Card Type sent by the provider associated to the original payment (Tokenisation Response). |
| ProfileHolder | The Profile/Card Holder Name sent by the provider associated to the original payment (Tokenisation Response). |
| TransactionAmount                     |The amount associated to the payment request.        |
| TransactionAmount.PrincipalAmount                     |The base amount associated to the payment request (This field is optional for Tokenization).        |
| TransactionAmount.ServiceFeeAmount                     |The service fee amount associated to the payment request.        |
| TransactionAmount.Currency                     |The currency associated to the payment request.

post.description:
This endpoint is used to request a refund for a Card/ACH payment already processed via AmcsPay.

## Request

| **Property** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| RequestType | Request Type is  "Refund". |
| PaymentType | Payment Type can be any of "CARD", "ACH ".| 
| TransactionOrigin | For Refund, transaction origin can only be "MOTO". |
| CallerIdentifier | The identification associated to the calling application.| 
| RequestId | The Caller supplied GUID associated to the Payment request.|
| CallerIPAddress | The IP Address associated to the the customer's location.|
| ProviderType | Provide Type can be any of "ACICards", "ACIElectronic", "Heartland", "MerchantPartners", "Payment Express", "Realex".| 
| TransactionAmount | The amount subjected for refund.|
| OriginalPaymentReference | The reference ID sent by the provider associated to the original payment being refunded.|

## Response

| **Property** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| AMCSPayReferenceId | The AMCS generated Response GUID associated to the Payment request. |
| ProviderReference | The reference number associated to the payment provider response. |
| ProviderResponseCode | The status code associated to the payment provider response. |
| ProviderAuthCode | The authorization code associated to the payment provider. |
| TransactionAmount                     |The amount associated to the payment request.        |
| TransactionAmount.PrincipalAmount                     |The base amount associated to the payment request (This field is optional for Tokenization).        |
| TransactionAmount.ServiceFeeAmount                     |The service fee amount associated to the payment request.        |
| TransactionAmount.Currency                     |The currency associated to the payment request.    |
| ResponseTimeStamp | The time stamp associated to the response payload. |
| Notes | More information associated to the payment. |
| TransactionStatus | The Transaction Status associated to the refund response can be any of type "Initiated" or "Failure".

This endpoint is used to make a payment using the saved profile(Card / ACH) via AmcsPay.

## Request

| **Property** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| RequestType | Request Type is  "VaultOrAutoPayment". |
| PaymentType | Payment Type can be any of "CARD", "ACH ".| 
| TransactionOrigin | Transaction Origin can be any of "MOTO", "ECOM". |
| CallerIdentifier | The identification associated to the calling application.| 
| RequestId | The Caller supplied GUID associated to the Payment request.|
| ProviderType | Provide Type can be any of "ACICards", "ACIElectronic", "Heartland", "MerchantPartners", "Payment Express", "Realex".| 
| TransactionAmount | The amount subjected for vault.|
| TokenReference | The Token Reference sent by the provider associated to the original payment.|
| HistoryReference | The history reference data sent by the provider associated to the original payment (Conditionally required).|
| MaskedProfileNumber | The Masked Profile/Card Number sent by the provider associated to the original payment (Conditionally required).|
 |
| CustomerInfo                         | The Details associated to the customer mandate for risk assessment (Conditionally required for making payments using ACI Cards).        |
| CustomerInfo.CustomerName                         | The Customer Name associated to the customer.        |
| CustomerInfo.CustomerId                         | The Customer Id associated to the customer.        |
| CustomerInfo.CustomerIP                         | The Customer Ip associated to the customer.        |
| CustomerInfo.CustomerStatus                         | The Customer Status associated to the customer.        |
| CustomerInfo.WebsiteUrl                         | The Website Url associated to the customer.

## Response

| **Property** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| AMCSPayReferenceId | The AMCS generated Response GUID associated to the Payment request. |
| ProviderReference | The reference number associated to the payment provider response. |
| ProviderResponseCode | The status code associated to the payment response. |
| ProviderAuthCode | The authorization code associated to the payment provider. |
| TransactionAmount                     |The amount associated to the payment request.        |
| TransactionAmount.PrincipalAmount                     |The base amount associated to the payment request (This field is optional for Tokenization).        |
| TransactionAmount.ServiceFeeAmount                     |The service fee amount associated to the payment request.        |
| TransactionAmount.Currency                     |The currency associated to the payment request.     |
| ResponseTimeStamp | The time stamp associated to the response payload. |
| Notes | More information associated to the payment. |
| TransactionStatus | The Transaction Status associated to the refund response can be any of type "Initiated" or "Failure".

This endpoint is used to make a card payment using a terminal device.

## Request

| Property | Description |
| --- | --- |
| ProviderType | Provide Type can be any of "ACICards", "ACIElectronic", "Heartland", "MerchantPartners", "Payment Express", "Realex" and "TerminalPay". However, this end point only supports Terminal Pay. |
| CallerIdentifier | The Caller Identification associated to the Payment request. |
| RequestId | The Caller supplied Request GUID associated to the Payment request. |
| TerminalId | The Terminal Id is the verifone terminal device serial number. |
| TransactionAmount | The Amount associated to the payment request. |
| TransactionAmount.PrincipalAmount | The Principal Amount associated to the payment request. |
| TransactionAmount.ServiceFeeAmount | The Service Fee Amount associated to the payment request. |
| TransactionAmount.Currency | The Currency associated to the payment request. |
| CardEntryMode | The Card entry mode of the payment instrument information. |
| EmailAddress | The e-mail address associated to the payment requestor. |

## Response

| **Property** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| TransactionStatus | The Transaction Status associated to the payment can be any of type "Success", "Failure". |
| AMCSPayReferenceId | The AMCS generated response GUID associated to the Payment request. |
| ProviderReference | The reference number associated to the payment provider. |
| ProviderResponseCode | The response code associated to the payment provider. |
| ProviderAuthCode | The authorization code associated to the payment provider. |
| TokenValue | The Token value associated to the card. |
| ResponseTimeStamp | The Timestamp of the payment response payload. |
| Notes | More information associated to the payment transaction. |

get.description:
This endpoint is used to get all the payment response details from the database within the given date and time.

## Request

| **Property** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| DateTo |Date To is the user input and it will be using this format (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS).|
| DateFrom |Date From is the user input and it will be using this format (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS).|

## Response

| **Property** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| customerId | The customerId associated to the customer.|
| customerName |The customer's name.|
| ARAccountCode |The account code used for Accounts Receivable. (AMCS will provide the account ARCode).|
| Currency |  Currency associated with the Customer account.|
| Amount | The amount associated to the payment.|
| PaymentType | Payment Type can be any of "Credit Card", "Direct Debit ", "Vault", "Credit Card/Auto-Pay" .|
| PaymentTransactionId | The AMCS generated Payment transaction Id associated to the payment request.|
| PaymentTransactionGuid | The AMCS generated payment transaction guid, it is used by the AmcsPay Data Base in the CallerInitiatePaymentRequest table and in the CallerTransactionIdentifier column.|
| TransactionStatus | The Transaction Status associated to the payment can be any of type "Pending", "Success", "Failed", "Timeout", "Cancelled". |
| PaymentId | The AMCS creates the record in the payment table, if the transaction status is success.|
| PaymentProvider | Payment provider can be any of "ACICards", "ACIElectronic", "Heartland", "MerchantPartners", "Payment Express", "Realex".|
| Notes | More information associated to the payment.|
| reference | The reference sent by the provider associated to the original payment response. |
| PaymentReference | The payment reference data sent by the provider associated to the original payment response.|
| DateInput |If the Payment is successful then it will record the date input in the payment transaction table.

post.description:
This endpoint creates a record in payment transaction table.

## Request

| Property                  | Description  |
| ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| CustomerARCode                      | The account code used for Accounts Receivable.        (AMCS will provide the account ARCode)                             |
| Channel               | Channel can be only MOBILL OR IVR                         | 

 ## Response

| Property                  | Description  |
| ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| CustomerGuid                 | The GUID associated to the customer.        |
| CustomerName               |The customer's name.        |
| CustomerBalance               |The amount associated to the payment.        |
| CustomerCurrency               | Customer Currency associated with the Customer account.        |
| InvoiceDetails               |It will show all the invoices associated with the account               |
| InvoiceNumber                   |The invoice number associated to the invoice. Filterable.        |
| InvoiceGUID                     |The GUID associated to the invoice.        |
| InvoiceDate                     |The invoiceDate associated to the invoice in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).        |
| ZipCode                         |Zip code is associated with the account               |
| InvoiceDueDate                  |The dueDate associated to the invoice in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).        |
| UnallocatedAmount               |The Unallocated Amount on the customers account.        |
| InvoiceCurrency                 |Invoice Currency asscoaited with the customer account             |
| TransactionReference            |Transaction Reference associated with account                 |
| ZipCode                         |ZipCode associated with the account address                                |
| InvoiceDate                     |The invoiceDate associated to the invoice in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).        |
| LastPaymentDate                 |When the last payment was made                     |
| MakePaymentLink                 |It shows the payment link (if any invoice available)                     |
| IsActive                 |Whether the customer is active              |
| MobillsEnrollment               |Whether the mobills enrollment is active.              |
| GUID         |Guid associated with the account

This endpoint updates an existing record in the payment transaction table and creates a record in the Amcs-Pay Database.

## Request

| Property                  | Description  |
| ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| TransactionReference                      | The Transaction Reference can get from the GetCustomerInvoce API.                           |
| PaymentAmount               | The payment amount associated to the payment request.  |
| Currency               | Currency associated with the Customer account.|
| Timestamp                     | The time stamp associated to the response payload. |
| TransactionPaymentType                     | Transaction payment type can be any of "CARD", "ACH ".  |
| IsIVR                     |IsIVR is a flag and should be set to true..  |
| Code                     |The codes for successfully processed transactions.  |
| Description                     |Description associated with the Code.  |
| Bin                     |The first six digits of the card.number. |
| Last4Digits                     |Last 4 digits of the "Credit", "Debit" Card.  |
| PaymentType                     |Payment Type DB, Debit: Debits the account of the end customer and credits the merchant account. |
| Holder                     |Holder of the credit card account. |
| ExpiryMonth                    | The expiry month of the card. |
| ExpiryYear                     |The expiry year of the card. |
| ConfirmationNumber                     |The Confirmation Number (payment reference) data sent by the provider associated to the original payment response.| 

 ## Response

| Property                  | Description  |
| ------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|  |
| Response                     |It returns the success response.

description.example: Request successfully processed in 'Merchant In Connect
